RainbruRPG::Terminal::MenuBar

RainbruRPG::Terminal::MenuBar Class Reference

#include <menubar.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Terminal::MenuBar:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The menubar used with the TerminalApp.

this is a horizontal MenuBar. We can add some Menu classes with the addMenu() method.

Member Function Documentation

void RainbruRPG::Terminal::MenuBar::addMenu ( Menu *  m  ) 

Add a Menu to the menuList.

It calls the push_back() method of the STL tMenuList. It performs no control.

Parameters:
m the Menu to add.
